headlines.description: The Brendan Rodgers era at Leicester got off to a losing start following Andre Gray's stoppage time winner for Watford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rodgers starts with a defeat after late Gray winner

headlines.description: Gonzalo Higuain and Jorginho scored either side of a Calum Chambers goal to earn Chelsea a hard-fought 2-1 victory at Fulham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jorginho, Higuain earn Chelsea win at Fulham

headlines.description: Mohamed Salah missed two one-on-one chances as Liverpool drew 0-0 away at Everton in the Merseyside derby.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool fail to go top with draw at Everton
